summary: REQ-10 appears implemented for the specific headings and modal title shown (no `font-cursive` on proposal/celebration headings or the letter modal title, and global body font set to Inter). REQ-11 appears implemented in the visible portion of the proposal screen (the removed line is not present). REQ-12 cannot be fully verified from the truncated App.tsx diff; the celebration section is cut off before any potential meme image / “MWAAHH” text would appear.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other UI elements use the `.font-cursive` utility to render cursive text.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows removal/absence of `font-cursive` on a few specific elements; it does not provide enough evidence to confirm that `.font-cursive` is not used anywhere else in the app.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all meme content from the celebration screen, including the couple-cats meme image and any visible "MWAAHH/MWAAHHH" meme text.
missing_requirements.reason: The celebration view in `App.tsx` is truncated right after the celebration headline; there is no visible evidence in the provided diff summary confirming removal of the meme image element and removal of any "MWAAHH" text line.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/claims that Tailwind config was extended with a romantic color palette.
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff summary lists only 5 modified files and does not include `frontend/tailwind.config.js`, yet `frontend-file-summaries.txt` claims it was modified/extended.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/claims about an empty placeholder backend query hook file (`frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts`).
hallucinated_features.reason: No such file is shown as added/modified/removed in the diff summary, but `frontend-file-summaries.txt` claims it exists as a placeholder.
